author: daveamos
title: Great holiday set!
review:
Replace this text with your introduction. You can insert images into your reviews: click on the Image icon. Please make sure they are less than about 500px wide.

Box/Instructions

Love the mostly yellow Lego box -- feels very "old school" Lego. There is a cute little story about the bat and the pumpkin on the back. My daughter (age 3) really liked hearing the story.

Parts

Good mix of black and gray parts. The set uses lots of SNOT-compatible parts, as well.?

The build

The build was more interesting than I thought it would be for a holiday set. Nothing too tricky, but lots of small parts and some basic SNOT techniques meant my 3 year old couldn't really help much (she sorted the parts by color for me).

The completed model

This bat is really cute! The wings, ears, and feet move for some good playability. 

Overall opinion

I'm always a sucker for the limited edition holiday sets. The cuteness of the bat made this set an impulse buy at the checkout of my local Lego store. It's one of the best holiday sets I've grabbed -- cute, fun to play with, and a lot of good parts for the money. It certainly beats last Halloween's pumpkin!

author: metashadow555
title: Nice
review:
Picked this up not so long ago from Walmart,  for pretty cheap considering the model size. I know it's already reviewed, but I figured I'd do this one since it's fairly fresh on my mind and I'm surprised I found it there since it's apparently a lego exclusive, but I digress. 

I usually lean towards minifigure scale sets more but this one has a lot of charm, and had more playability than I thought it would, even though that doesn't usually mean much to me.

I like the way both the bat and the pumpkin are built up, with not many studs showing on either model. The flipper-like pieces used for the mouth and the teeth look nice, the wings have a cool set up that makes them turnable, and the pumpkin is, well, a pumpkin. The stem was really irritating getting on.

Overall I'd say pick this up if you happen to see it...somewhere, want a cool halloween set, or just a cool set like this for cheap.
